page.title: 04HOLT
page.content:
{HALLS {HOLT}HAS TWO HALLS, they are the Parish Hall and the Village Hall. The Village Hall used to be a school but it was closed down. The Parish Hall belongs to the church and is used for clubs.
{CHAPEL} A charter was found in 1368 that records that there was a church in Holt. In 1835 the chapel was knocked down, extended and rebuilt in stone. When the church was rebuilt it had enough seats for 319 people. In 1985 the congregation number was 50. The original plan was to have 600 seats, but the idea never developed.
